name: Can't Jump, Just Rotate!
description:
This is a game where you can't jump, BUT, you can rotate objects around you! This game was also made for the "Kenney Game Jam 2021" , a game jam where you use assets made from Kenney in your game. The theme this year was "Rotation". I expected everybody would make a puzzle game where you rotate objects, so I added a little twist, you can't jump.

Controls: 

A, D or Left Arrow, Right Arrow

Left Click objects to rotate them

Game Tips:

If you are stuck just click on every object around you.

If you clicked an object it's selected, so if you press space you can rotate it.
